displayProperties.name: Explosive Payload
displayProperties.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact. Improves range.

displayProperties.name: Vanishing Step
displayProperties.description: Dodging makes you invisible.

displayProperties.name: Solar Damage Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Solar damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Snapshot Sights
displayProperties.description: Faster time to aim down sights. Stability is increased.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Heating Up
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil for a longer duration.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Persistence
displayProperties.description: Void buffs applied to you (Invisibility, Overshield, and Devour) have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: The Game is Afoot!
displayProperties.description: Follow the clue trail and see where it leads.

displayProperties.name: Steady Hands
displayProperties.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Suppression Mastery
displayProperties.description: Suppression effects you create have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: High-Impact Reserves
displayProperties.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage. Improved damage starts earlier in the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Ensemble
displayProperties.description: Substantially improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.

displayProperties.name: Zen Moment
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability. Improves base stability.

displayProperties.name: Whirlwind Blade
displayProperties.description: Rapid Sword strikes increase this weapon's damage for an improved duration. Guarding ends the effect.

displayProperties.name: Sympathetic Arsenal
displayProperties.description: Reloading a short time after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Substantially increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Disruption Break
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Munitions
displayProperties.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Bastion
displayProperties.description:
Cast your Super to grant Overshield to nearby allies. 

Casting your Barricade grants Overshield to yourself and nearby allies and empowers it, enabling it to slowly regenerate the Overshield of allies bunkering behind it and extend their Overshield duration.

displayProperties.name: Overflow
displayProperties.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo loads this weapon even further beyond normal capacity.

displayProperties.name: Box Breathing
displayProperties.description: Aiming this weapon for an improved short period without firing grants bonus range and precision damage that resets after firing or exiting zoom.

displayProperties.name: Recombination
displayProperties.description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot. Increases range.

displayProperties.name: Flash Counter
displayProperties.description: Melee blocked immediately after guarding disorients and weakens the attacker. Ammo reserves increased.

displayProperties.name: Rapid Hit
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed substantially.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Leeching
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Exchange
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows grant grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Umbral Sustenance
displayProperties.description: This weapon's magazine is automatically reloaded when you gain Devour, a Void overshield, or become invisible.

displayProperties.name: Surrounded
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains improved bonus damage when three or more targets are in close proximity.

displayProperties.name: Voltaic Mirror
displayProperties.description: Attacks you redirect with your Arc Staff deal massively increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Void Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Void weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Force
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases projectile damage for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Bottomless Grief
displayProperties.description: Substantially increases magazine size. While you are the last living member of your fireteam, each final blow refills your magazine.

displayProperties.name: Adrenaline Junkie
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Desperado
displayProperties.description: Reloading after a precision final blow increases your rate of fire for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Dragonfly
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows create an elemental damage explosion. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Expulsion
displayProperties.description: Void ability final blows cause targets to explode.

displayProperties.name: Mulligan
displayProperties.description: Missing a shot has an improved chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Under Pressure
displayProperties.description: Greatly improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.

displayProperties.name: Duelist's Trance
displayProperties.description: Sword final blows grant greatly increased charge rate, efficiency, and defense until this weapon is stowed.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Subsistence
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves with an increased amount of ammo.

displayProperties.name: Multikill Clip
displayProperties.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid final blows made beforehand for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Firefly
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows with this weapon substantially increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Killing Wind
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Glaives.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons.

displayProperties.name: Kickstart
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus damage and charge rate during a slide after sprinting for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Impulse Amplifier
displayProperties.description: Massively increases projectile velocity, substantially increases reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding ammo while you have a Glaive equipped.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Eye of the Storm
displayProperties.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower. Increases stability.

displayProperties.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Celerity
displayProperties.description:
Substantially increases weapon handling and reload speed. Gain the following effects while you are the last living member of your fireteam:
• Increased target acquisition
• Increased handling and reload speed
• Reduced flinch from incoming fire

displayProperties.name: Trench Barrel
displayProperties.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, improved handling, and improved reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Glaives get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Glaive.

displayProperties.name: Disruption Break
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Quickdraw
displayProperties.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast. Handling is improved.

displayProperties.name: Steady Hands
displayProperties.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a longer duration.

displayProperties.name: Suppressing Glaive
displayProperties.description: Damaging combatants with your Glaive suppresses them, preventing them from using abilities for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Pulse Monitor
displayProperties.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when lightly wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Cluster Bomb
displayProperties.description: Rockets spawn cluster bombs upon detonation. Blast radius is increased.

displayProperties.name: Offensive Bulwark
displayProperties.description:
While you have an Overshield or are inside Ward of Dawn, your grenade charges significantly faster, you have increased melee range and damage, and melee final blows extend the duration of your Overshield.

You gain an additional shield throw while in Sentinel Shield.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down Pulse Rifle sights loads a high-impact burst that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Demolitionist
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Auto-Loading Holster
displayProperties.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after an improved short period of time.

displayProperties.name: Dual Loader
displayProperties.description: Reloads three shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Stats for All
displayProperties.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Land Tank
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant increased Resilience and additional damage resistance from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Vortex
displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb creates a singularity that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.

displayProperties.name: Nova Warp
displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Cataclysm
displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Edge of Action
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Echo of Starvation
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Devour.

displayProperties.name: Tilting at Windmills
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases movement speed until you lower your shield for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Kinetic weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Edge of Concurrence
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Glaive Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of Glaive ammo you can carry.

displayProperties.name: Rewind Rounds
displayProperties.description: When this weapon's magazine is empty, it refills from reserves based on the number of hits. Improves range.

displayProperties.name: Golden Tricorn Enhanced
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage for an improved duration. While this buff is active, grenade or melee final blows of the same damage type greatly increase its damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Piercing Bowstring
displayProperties.description:
Bows gain shield-piercing arrows, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: No Distractions
displayProperties.description: Aiming this weapon for a very short period of time reduces flinch.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Undermining
displayProperties.description: Your Void grenades weaken targets.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Chain Reaction
displayProperties.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion. Improves ammo reserves.

displayProperties.name: Stunning Recovery
displayProperties.description: Stunning a Champion partially refills your magazine, triggers health regeneration, and improves recovery for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Controlled Demolition
displayProperties.description: Hitting a target with a Void ability or Volatile explosion makes them volatile. Further damage to a volatile target causes them to explode. Grants you and nearby allies health when volatile targets explode near you.

displayProperties.name: Feeding Frenzy
displayProperties.description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Psionic Forging I
displayProperties.description: Increases the duration of the Psychohack Origin Trait and the effect of the Suros Synergy Origin Trait.

displayProperties.name: Psionic Forging II
displayProperties.description: Increases the duration of the Land Tank Origin Trait and the effect of the Häkke Breach Armaments Origin Trait.

displayProperties.name: Relentless Strikes
displayProperties.description: [Light Attack]  : Landing three light-attack hits within an improved short time grants Sword ammo.

displayProperties.name: Energy Transfer
displayProperties.description: Guarding while receiving damage generates class ability energy at an improved rate.

displayProperties.name: Iron Grip
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon stability at the cost of a small amount of reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Feed the Void
displayProperties.description:
Defeat a target with a Void ability to activate Devour.

While Devour is active, final blows restore health and extend Devour.

displayProperties.name: Veist Stinger
displayProperties.description: Damaging an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to reload the magazine and increase movement speed while aiming down sights. Bows receive faster draw speed and swords receive faster charge rate while this perk is active.

displayProperties.name: Lucent Shrieker Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a Lucent Hive Shrieker to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Harmonic Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid weapon final blows with damage matching your subclass type create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: One-Two Punch
displayProperties.description: Hitting a target with every pellet in a shot increases melee damage for an improved short duration.

displayProperties.name: Hakke Breach Armaments
displayProperties.description: This weapon deals increased damage against vehicles, turrets, barricades, and Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Fervid Coldsnap
displayProperties.description: Your Coldsnap grenades have an additional charge, recharge faster on impact, and have increased seeker travel distance.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Dilation
displayProperties.description: While crouched, you sneak faster and gain enhanced radar resolution.

displayProperties.name: Omega Strike
displayProperties.description: Land hits with the slug launcher to load missiles,[Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to launch all missiles in a single volley.

displayProperties.name: Iron Reach
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon range at the cost of a reduced amount of weapon stability.

displayProperties.name: Shield Disorient
displayProperties.description: Energy-matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Remote Shield
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a protective shield on impact.

displayProperties.name: Successful Warm-Up
displayProperties.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.

displayProperties.name: Lasting Impression
displayProperties.description: Rockets attach on impact and detonate after a delay. Substantially increases blast radius and increases damage.

displayProperties.name: Slideshot
displayProperties.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability greatly.

displayProperties.name: Shadowshot: Moebius Quiver
displayProperties.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

Fire two volleys of three Void Arrows that seek nearby targets. Shadowshot makes targets volatile and deals increased damage to tethered targets. Defeating tethered targets creates Orbs of Power.

displayProperties.name: Shadowshot: Deadfall
displayProperties.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot pull targets toward the impact point, which then become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.

displayProperties.name: Spectral Blades
displayProperties.description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.
[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack and once again vanish from sight.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard's Vindication
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant a small amount of health.

displayProperties.name: Suppressive Darkness
displayProperties.description: Whenever you suppress a combatant, you also weaken them, causing them to take additional damage for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Harvest
displayProperties.description: Defeating weakened targets with precision final blows will create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Backup Plan
displayProperties.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for an improved short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Munitions
displayProperties.description: This weapon adapts its damage output to be more effective against energy shields that don't match its damage type. Improves damage increase.

displayProperties.name: Overloaded Auto/SMG
displayProperties.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Auto Rifles and Submachine Guns grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Triple Tap
displayProperties.description: Landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Turnabout
displayProperties.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Unrelenting
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.

displayProperties.name: Grave Robber
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Screaming Swarm
displayProperties.description: Fires a stream of sentient projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Compulsive Reloader
displayProperties.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Suros Synergy
displayProperties.description: Reloading grants this weapon bonus handling and reduces incoming flinch for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Ambitious Assassin
displayProperties.description: Greatly overflows the magazine based on the number of defeated targets before reloading.

displayProperties.name: Reconstruction
displayProperties.description: This weapon slowly reloads itself over time, up to more than double capacity.

displayProperties.name: Devouring Rift
displayProperties.description: Your empowering rifts grant you Devour. Damage dealt from within them will disrupt combatants.

displayProperties.name: Counterattack
displayProperties.description: Blocking an attack immediately after guarding increases damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Void Leech
displayProperties.description: Leech Void debuffs.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Force
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases projectile damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Volatile Flow
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void elemental well grants your Void weapons Volatile rounds.

displayProperties.name: Successful Warm-Up
displayProperties.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: One for All
displayProperties.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Compulsive Reloader
displayProperties.description: Grants greatly increased reload speed when close to full magazine.

displayProperties.name: Tunnel Vision
displayProperties.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Focused Fury
displayProperties.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage for an improved duration. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Clown Cartridge
displayProperties.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves to an improved degree.

displayProperties.name: En Garde
displayProperties.description: Quick attacks immediately after swapping to this Sword do additional damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Timed Payload
displayProperties.description: Projectiles attached to targets explode after a short delay. Increases range.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Reprisal
displayProperties.description: Final blows when surrounded by combatants grant Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Firing Line
displayProperties.description: This weapon deals increased precision damage when near two or more allies. Range is increased.

displayProperties.name: Encore
displayProperties.description:
Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.
Effect duration is improved.

displayProperties.name: Edge of Intent
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Reservoir Burst
displayProperties.description: When the battery is full, your next burst deals additional damage and causes targets to explode on death. Improves stability.

displayProperties.name: Danger Zone
displayProperties.description:
The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.
Base blast radius is also improved.

displayProperties.name: Firmly Planted
displayProperties.description: Greatly increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.

displayProperties.name: Stylish Executioner
displayProperties.description:
Defeating a weakened, suppressed, or volatile target grants Invisibility and Truesight.

After performing a Stylish Execution, your next melee attack while invisible weakens targets.

displayProperties.name: Omolon Fluid Dynamics
displayProperties.description: This weapon has increased reload speed and stability for the top half of the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Headseeker
displayProperties.description: Body shots landed with this weapon increase precision damage for a short time. Improves stability.

displayProperties.name: Fourth Time's the Charm
displayProperties.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine. Increases time between precision shots.

displayProperties.name: Outlaw
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows greatly decrease reload time for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Stasis weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Chill Clip
displayProperties.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets. Stability is improved.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Head
displayProperties.description: Arrows explode after a short delay. Increases accuracy.

displayProperties.name: Iron Gaze
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon target acquisition at the cost of a small amount of weapon range.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition and accuracy for Glaives.

displayProperties.name: Skulking Wolf
displayProperties.description: During the Hunt, final blows with this weapon grant enhanced radar and remove you from opposing radar.

displayProperties.name: One Quiet Moment
displayProperties.description: Grants increased reload speed when out of combat.

displayProperties.name: Shoot to Loot
displayProperties.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves. Increases range.

displayProperties.name: Energy Vampirism
displayProperties.description: Gain energy for your least-charged ability when you suppress a target.

displayProperties.name: Slideways
displayProperties.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability greatly.

displayProperties.name: Trench Barrel
displayProperties.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, improved handling, and improved reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

displayProperties.name: Melee Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Powered melee combatant final blows spawn elemental wells matching your subclass energy type.

displayProperties.name: Rangefinder
displayProperties.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification, and improves handling. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Glaive
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Full Auto Trigger System
displayProperties.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Light
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power increases the next projectile's blast radius and damage. Increases projectile velocity.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Glaives over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Opening Shot
displayProperties.description: Greatly improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.

displayProperties.name: Arc Damage Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Arc damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Osteo Striga Catalyst
displayProperties.description: Poison final blows return ammo to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Assassin's Blade
displayProperties.description: Sword final blows boost movement speed and damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Remnants
displayProperties.description: Your lingering grenade effects (Vortex Grenade, Void Wall, Void Spike, and Axion Bolt) have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: Cornered
displayProperties.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants. Improves stability.

displayProperties.name: Worm's Hunger
displayProperties.description: Fires exploding Hive worms.

displayProperties.name: Invader Tracker
displayProperties.description: Damaging the Invader with this weapon marks them for allies.

displayProperties.name: Worm Byproduct
displayProperties.description: Taking damage from your own worm projectile detonation empowers your weapons for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Provision
displayProperties.description: Damaging targets with grenades grants melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Surplus
displayProperties.description: Substantially increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Instability
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with grenades grants Volatile Rounds to your Void weapons.

displayProperties.name: Child of the Old Gods
displayProperties.description:
Cast your rift to create a Void Soul. When you damage a target with a weapon, your Void Soul flies to them and drains them, doing damage and weakening them.

When a target is being drained, you are granted grenade and melee energy (if running healing rift) or health (if running empowering rift).

Defeating a target who is being drained by your Void Soul grants class ability energy.

displayProperties.name: Swashbuckler
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage for an improved duration from melee final blows and defeating targets with this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Sneak Bow
displayProperties.description: Increases hold time and reload speed; prevents radar pings from shooting while crouched. Improves stability and reload.

displayProperties.name: Rampage
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant increased damage for an improved duration. Stacks 3 times.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Tireless Blade
displayProperties.description: Sword ammo granted for every other powered Sword final blow, with a chance for additional ammo to be provided.

displayProperties.name: Signal Intercept
displayProperties.description: Adds a modified Black Armory theme to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Capsule Gang Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a neo-capsule appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Ward of Dawn
displayProperties.description: Create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies. Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.

displayProperties.name: Sentinel Shield
displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.

displayProperties.name: Headstone
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows spawn a Stasis crystal at a target's location. Improves stability.

displayProperties.name: Arc Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Arc weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Thresh
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Solar Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Solar weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Accelerant
displayProperties.description:
[Grenade] : Hold to overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.

Vortex Grenade: Increases the size and linger duration of the vortex.

Axion Bolt: Creates an additional seeker.

Scatter Grenade: Has submunitions track to nearby targets.

Magnetic Grenade: Releases a short-range Void blast.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Vorpal Weapon
displayProperties.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active. Reload is improved.

displayProperties.name: Chill Clip
displayProperties.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Redirection
displayProperties.description: Damaging rank-and-file combatants substantially increases damage against more powerful ones.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Fortification
displayProperties.description: Replace Barricade with a wall of Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Focused Fury
displayProperties.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.

displayProperties.name: Threat Detector
displayProperties.description: Greatly increased reload, stability, and handling when targets are in close proximity.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Glaive Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Glaives.

displayProperties.name: Devouring Depths
displayProperties.description: Casting your Void Super while you are critically wounded or benefitting from Devour increases your damage with that Super.

displayProperties.name: Trinary Vision
displayProperties.description: Releases three waves on impact.

displayProperties.name: Turnabout
displayProperties.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Tilting at Windmills
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases movement speed until you lower your shield.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Genesis
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves, with Kinetic weapons overflowing. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.

displayProperties.name: Wellspring
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Obscurity
displayProperties.description: Finisher final blows grant Invisibility.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Field Prep
displayProperties.description: Greatly increased ammo reserves. Improved faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Glaives get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Glaive.

displayProperties.name: Harmony
displayProperties.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Toxic Overload
displayProperties.description: Landing a final blow or multiple precision hits triggers a burst that poisons nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Hip-Fire Grip
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.

displayProperties.name: Immovable Object
displayProperties.description: Projectile impacts grant increased weapon energy while you're stationary with your shield raised.

displayProperties.name: Tracking Module
displayProperties.description: Adds tracking capability to rockets. Locks onto targets when aiming down sights. Increases blast radius.

displayProperties.name: Underdog
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains a boost to reload speed and stability as your health gets lower.

displayProperties.name: Alacrity
displayProperties.description: Gain increased reload, stability, aim assist, and range when you are the last living member of your fireteam or running solo.

displayProperties.name: Stats for All
displayProperties.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Seeker
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot track targets across the ground and unleash chain lightning on impact.

displayProperties.name: Adagio
displayProperties.description: After defeating a target, this weapon fires, charges, or draws more slowly and deals increased damage for an improved time.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Grand Overture Catalyst
displayProperties.description: Missile explosions will blind combatants. Those defeated by missile impacts then explode.

displayProperties.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
displayProperties.description: Rapidly improves accuracy and stability while continuously holding down the trigger.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Frenzy
displayProperties.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon for an improved duration until you are out of combat.

displayProperties.name: Immovable Object
displayProperties.description: Projectile impacts grant substantially increased weapon energy while you're stationary with your shield raised.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Glaive
displayProperties.description:
Glaives you wield fire a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Lucent Finisher
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Lucent Hive Lightbearer or Champion with your finisher spawns Heavy ammo for you and your allies.

displayProperties.name: Moving Target
displayProperties.description: Increased movement speed and improved target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Trapper's Ambush
displayProperties.description:
Activate Quickfall to spend your melee charge and dive to the ground, creating a large smoke cloud on impact, which then dissipates. Targets caught in the cloud are weakened, and allies are made invisible.

Your Smoke Bomb makes nearby allies invisible when it attaches to nearby surfaces or targets.

displayProperties.name: Restorative Turret
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a healing turret on impact.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Glaives.

displayProperties.name: Archer's Tempo
displayProperties.description: Draw time substantially decreases after every precision hit for a longer duration.

displayProperties.name: Osmosis
displayProperties.description: Using your grenade ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow it. Handling is improved.

displayProperties.name: Tap the Trigger
displayProperties.description: Grants an improved short period of greatly increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.

displayProperties.name: Full Auto Trigger System
displayProperties.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto. Increases stability.

displayProperties.name: Depths of Duskfield
displayProperties.description: Duskfield grenades have a larger effect and reduce damage for allies inside the field.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Domineering
displayProperties.description: After suppressing a target, you gain greatly increased Mobility for a short duration and your equipped weapon is reloaded from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Wrath of the Colossus
displayProperties.description: Fully automatic, slow-firing slug launcher with a charge time.

displayProperties.name: Cauterizing Flame
displayProperties.description: Sunspots heal you when you have Sun Warrior. Create a Sunspot when critically wounded.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Glaives.

displayProperties.name: Kill Clip
displayProperties.description: Reloading after defeating a target grants increased damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Full Court
displayProperties.description: Increases detonation damage as the projectile travels farther before exploding. Increases blast radius.

displayProperties.name: Lead from Gold
displayProperties.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants increased ammo to this weapon.
